Draft Rating:

D

Donnie Walsh ranks in the 27th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Walsh's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 7 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Reggie Miller with 11th pick but was worth 3th pick.
  • Drafted Sean Green with 41th pick but was worth 24th pick.
  • Drafted Dale Davis with 13th pick but was worth 8th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Chuck Person with 4th pick but was worth 61th pick.
  • Drafted Rik Smits with 2th pick but was worth 31th pick.
  • Drafted Erick Dampier with 10th pick but was worth 43th pick.

Trade Rating:

B+

Donnie Walsh ranks in the 77th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Detlef Schrempf, Antonio Davis to IND.
  • Lost Herb Williams to DAL.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Derrick McKey, Gerald Paddio to IND.
  • Lost Detlef Schrempf to SEA.

Signing Rating:

Donnie Walsh ranks in the 24th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.

  • Signed Byron Scott in 1993.
  • Signed Sam Perkins in 1999.
Their worst signings:
